content: Hi,Now you can purchase the specific video series you want. The more series you buy, the more discount you will get.25% discount, coupon SAVE25Purchase the video series you want.What is DemoTiger?DemoTiger.com offers a series of high-quality video tutorials tailored for web hosting companies. These videos feature Full HD video, professional narration by a voice artist, and accompanying text instructions. They can be seamlessly integrated with the knowledge base of WHMCS, Blesta, HostBill, WISECP, SupportPal, Zendesk, ClientExec, and WordPress.Now we have 218 professionally made tutorial videos.Buy All Series/Video Tutorials Sale! (Coupon Code: SAVE25Â  )180+ Reviews!! on WHMCS Market Place.Demo 1 - How your WHMCS look after importing our videos.Features:Purchase video tutorials for your Knowledge-base, and stand different from other hosting companies. Helpful for boosting your website SEO/Ranking. Used by various hosting companies. Up-to date. Multilingual - Available in English and Dutch. Purchase the web hosting tutorial series you like. Buy Only Specific Series(English)cPanel Series Plesk Obsidian Series (Linux) DirectAdmin Series SolusVM 1 Series Virtualizor Series WordPress Series Thunderbird Email Series Outlook 2019 Email Series Filezilla Client Windows FTP Series Video Tutorials in Dutch Language: (With Titles/Instructions & background music)Available Languages:English (All Series)Dutch (cPanel & DirectAdmin Series)About DemoTiger?DemoTiger provides professional video tutorials for hosting companies. We have 218+ video tutorials on the latest version of cPanel, Plesk, WordPress, etc. Videos are available in the voice of a human voice-over artist.If you wish to compete with bigger companies having lots of video tutorials for their customers, then it is your chance to advertise and increase your presence by buying high-quality video tutorials from DemoTiger.Supported Platforms/Billing Software:- Support WHMCS v5 to v8.x- Support Blesta "Support Manager" and "Support Manager Pro"- WordPress- WISECP- ClientExec- Zendesk- HostBillApp- SupportPal- Video Embed code for adding it to non-supported platforms.Buy All Series/Video Tutorials Flash Sale!(Coupon Code: SAVE25 )Thanks.DemoTiger.
